oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena

Class Attachment

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena.Attachment

  • public class Attachment
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that helps GraphOracleSem and DatasetGraphOracleSem query multiple Oracle RDF/OWL/SKOS models, and/or run inference using specified rulebase(s). It consists four components, a list of model names, a list of rulebases, an InferenceMaintenanceMode object, and a QueryOptions object.

    The first two components map to sdo_rdf_models and sdo_rdf_rulebases in a straightforward fashion.

    Since:
    Sept. 2007

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String[] NO_ADDITIONAL_MODELS
      A constant (empty string array) defined to specify that there is no additional RDF/OWL/SKOS model involved in an Attachment instance.
      static Attachment NO_ATTACHMENT
      A constant denoting the fact that nothing is specified in an Attachment instance.

    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        public static Attachment createInstance(java.lang.String modelName)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of an Oracle RDF/OWL/SKOS to be attached to a GraphOracleSem instance. Note that no rulebase is selected.
        Returns:
        the Attachment object.

      • createInstance

        public static Attachment createInstance(java.lang.String[] modelNames,
                                        java.lang.String[] rulebaseNames,
                                        InferenceMaintenanceMode imm,
                                        QueryOptions qo)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        modelNames - an array of model names to be attached to a GraphOracleSem instance.
        rulebaseNames - an array of rulebase names to be attached to a GraphOracleSem instance.
        imm - an instance of InferenceMaintenanceMode specifying how inference (entailment) should be maintained/updated.
        qo - an instance of QueryOptions specifying whether querying inferred graph of incomplete status or invalid status is allowed.
        Returns:
        the Attachment object.

      • createInstance

        public static Attachment createInstance(java.lang.String[] modelNames,
                                        java.lang.String rulebaseName,
                                        InferenceMaintenanceMode imm,
                                        QueryOptions qo)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        modelNames - an array of model names to be attached to a GraphOracleSem instance.
        rulebaseName - name of a rulebase to be attached to a GraphOracleSem instance.
        imm - an instance of InferenceMaintenanceMode specifying how inference (entailment) should be maintained/updated.
        qo - an instance of QueryOptions specifying whether querying inferred graph of incomplete status or invalid status is allowed.
        Returns:
        the Attachment object.

      • createInstance

        public static Attachment createInstance(java.lang.String modelName,
                                        java.lang.String rulebaseName,
                                        InferenceMaintenanceMode imm,
                                        QueryOptions qo)
        Creates an instance of Attachment. Things specified in this attachment include an RDF/OWL/SKOS model and a rulebase.
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of another Oracle RDF/OWL/SKOS model to be attached to a GraphOracleSem instance.
        rulebaseName - name of a rulebase to be attached to a GraphOracleSem instance.
        imm - an instance of InferenceMaintenanceMode specifying how inference (entailment) should be maintained/updated.
        qo - an instance of QueryOptions specifying whether querying inferred graph of incomplete status or invalid status is allowed.
        Returns:
        the Attachment object.

      • setDefGraphForLocalInference

        public void setDefGraphForLocalInference(java.lang.String modelName)
        Set the model name that will be used as the TBox during Named Graph based Local Inference (NGLI).
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of Oracle model that contains the default graph (TBox)

      • setInferenceOption

        public void setInferenceOption(java.lang.String inferenceOption)
        Set the inference option used by performInference (create_entailment).
        Parameters:
        inferenceOption - the inference option to be used by future performInference calls. One can enable parallel, incremental inference, and/or set using RAW datatype through this API. Note the the inference option set by this method can be overridden by the settings done in GraphOracleSem or DatasetGraphOracleSem

      • setUseLocalInference

        public void setUseLocalInference(boolean useLocalInference)
        Sets a flag denoting whether local inference should be carried out when performInference is invoked. By default, a global inference will be performed.
        Parameters:
        useLocalInference - true or false to use local inference.
